title: The Ghost in the shed
creator_credit: Bosustow Entertainment, Nick Bosustow and Sam Weiss
brief_description: A whimsical story of a polite but persistent ghost of a secretly buried murder victim. His attempts to draw attention to his remains mystify the family in the house. Based on the book by Marilynne K. Roach.
creator_credit_for_label: Bosustow Entertainment, Nick Bosustow and Sam Weiss
